title: Need cheap consulting .
content:
Hi! Their ,  
I have made font with fontlab 4.5 . Need some one to generate TTP properly .  
Thanks !  
 [Ethioscript@verizon.net](mailto:Ethioscript@verizon.net)
author: Aleme

comments.content: True Type? Or do you mean you need the font hinted so it displays to screen at small sizes well?

Thanks for the reply . I have doen as much as I could . Including hinting . I need some one to guide me and generate true type font properly .  
Thanks Eben.  
Aleme

Sorry I meant true type font .  
Thanks !

I would suggest that you post some images of trhe font so we can see what you have & so you can describe what you feel still needs to be done. Then I am sure someone may be able to help you sort it out yourself - or offer their services. If you really want it sorted out for you; try to get clear what terms you would be willing to accept.

How about [Learn FontLab Fast](http://web.archive.org/wiki/Learn%20FontLab%20Fast)? That should provide a step by step on saving font as a TTF.

Cheers, Si
